πέρῠσι,
before a vowel πέρυσιν, Aeolic dialect πέρρυσι [Refs 3rd c.BC+], Doric dialect πέρυτι [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: adverb:— a year ago, last year, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἡμεῖς ἐσμεν οἱ αὐτοὶ νῦν τε καὶ π. [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἀπὸ π. [NT]. (Cf. Sanskrit parút, Armenian heru, MHG. vert 'last year'.)
